website_summaries.verdict: Well-priced door sweep that will give you a good level of energy efficiency performance over time.
pros: At 48" in length, will give you a greater level of coverage than other door sweeps to ensure better energy performance
Vinyl insert provides a weatherproof protection for you
Offers an aluminum finish that will deliver longevity versus some door sweeps that don't have metal in the construction
cons: Doesn't look quite as nice as some other door sweep options

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This door sweep is the perfect size for the extra wide screen door on our gazebo. It was easy to install and the price was very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie J

customer_reviews.title: Good product, works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: These work perfectly. The enlcosed screws willstrip out, so I suggest using hex head screws for installation. Also, you'll probably want to install an extra screw at each end to keep the ends from bending. An excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: H20Sun&Fun

customer_reviews.title: WOW --
customer_reviews.text: You have to understand I have problems with anything that had to do with tools -- BUT My wife was shocked when I had the strips done when she got home from shopping I tolder It took me 3 hours -- BUT took me less than 15 minues for each door.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bent in two places
customer_reviews.text: Came bent to two places but box had no damage so someone didn’t care when packing.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Schnackenberg

customer_reviews.title: Good, quaility product. Decent price.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Well made. Needed to replace sweeps on all the outside doors of a 35,000 SF building. Fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what I need to seal the bottom of a large door thanks
customer_reviews.author: douglas wright

customer_reviews.title: I am a general contractor / Architect did not like the door sweeps for LaCantina foldable doors I just ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a general contractor / Architect did not like the door sweeps for LaCantina foldable doors I just installed. So I searched for a sturdy substitute and found this sweep to be tough and sturdy. I wished they had it in white and white
customer_reviews.author: Muhannad E.

customer_reviews.title: worked great
customer_reviews.text: This product was just what I needed to seal the bottom of a large, old, wooden door. I've used this product 2 times and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: robert b

customer_reviews.title: easy to install
customer_reviews.text: works great preventing drafts coming under the door...no more towel rolled up under doors in the winter...it only took about 5 minutes to install
customer_reviews.author: A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Item as described
customer_reviews.text: Item was received in perfect condition and as described. I was looking for a longer sweep, and this fit the bill. Great product, thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick K. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Fit the doors & my budget
customer_reviews.text: I had 2 48" doors in need of sweeps. These did the trick and matched toe existing screw holes exactly. Win/ Win.
customer_reviews.author: Albert D. Smith III

customer_reviews.title: High quality and it was easy to install on my door
customer_reviews.text: It was just what I needed. The product is what you would expect from M-D. High quality and it was easy to install on my door. It had all the screws and all you needed was a screwdriver and a man or woman behind the screwdriver.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Dickey

customer_reviews.title: Did the Trick!
customer_reviews.text: It's a good one. I couldn't find this size, 48", at local retailer so I found it at amazon affiliated retailer and I was pleased with packaging and delivery. I got it shorten and it did the trick. I'm sure it would last several years since it has good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy-1

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product is as expected but I ordered 4 and they sent each one separately.
customer_reviews.author: Swift

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my office. It is a 42" door and my employer wouldn't buy one. I bought and installed myself! Cuts down on the cold...
customer_reviews.author: DDF

product_meta.title: M-D Building Products 5413 48-Inch Deluxe Aluminum and Vinyl Door Sweep
product_meta.description:
Size:48"Energy loss through the bottom of doors is the most commonly addressed area to improve your home or building's seal. Sweeps are installed on the face of the door so that a seal is formed when the door is closed. These products are easily installed and need to be regularly replaced to ensure the building is insulated. M-D Building Products offers a number of different finishes and technologies to best suit your individual home sealing application.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Energy loss through the bottom of doors is the most commonly addressed area to improve your home or building's seal. Sweeps are installed on the face of the door so that a seal is formed when the door is closed. These products are easily installed and need to be regularly replaced to ensure the building is insulated. M-D Building Products offers a number of different finishes and technologies to best suit your individual home sealing application.
feature_bullets: Improve the energy efficiency of your home
Available in a variety of finishes to match your door
